h2_title: Venom Daoist Boss Fight and Guide - Second Encounter
content: You'll also have to be ready to deflect or dodge if he crouches down with sword raised behind his head, as he'll dash forward and back at rapid speed.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Venom_Daoist.md', within the main section titled 'Venom Daoist', specifically from the subsection 'Venom Daoist Boss Fight and Guide - Second Encounter'.
The content is as follows:
You'll also have to be ready to deflect or dodge if he crouches down with sword raised behind his head, as he'll dash forward and back at rapid speed.
